name: MCError.Code
desc: Error codes found in MCErrorDomain error domain NSError objects returned by methods in the Multipeer Connectivity framework.

items.name: case notConnected
items.desc: Your app attempted to send data to a peer that is not connected.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: Your app passed an invalid value as a parameter.

items.name: case unsupported
items.desc: The operation is unsupported. For example, this error is returned if you call sendResource(at:withName:toPeer:withCompletionHandler:) with a URL that is neither a local file nor a web URL.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The operation was cancelled by the user.
